title: The Interrogation  | 2.3
description:
In an identity crisis ensues as Noah and Sara must decide how far they are willing to go to get the answers they need from the soldier they’re holding captive. For them to escape, intel is needed, but it comes at a cost, and are they willing to pay it?
CAST
Narrator – Mike Howorun
Noah – Brady Roberts
Sara – Greta Carew-Johns
Captive -Adrian Neblett
Palmer - Kamy Bruder
Editing and Sound Design – Matthew Hall & Mike Howorun
Post Production Producer - Rob Johnston
Written/Directed – Mike Howorun
Produced by - Matthew Hall, Brady Roberts, Mike Howorun, Dila Velázquez
Created by Mike Howorun & Brady Roberts
Contact: escapingdenverpod@gmail.com
Instagram: @escapingdenver
Reddit: r/escapingdenver
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
In an identity crisis ensues as Noah and Sara must decide how far they are willing to go to get the answers they need from the soldier they’re holding captive. For them to escape, intel is needed, but it comes at a cost, and are they willing to pay it?

CAST

Narrator – Mike Howorun

Noah – Brady Roberts

Sara – Greta Carew-Johns

Captive -Adrian Neblett

Palmer - Kamy Bruder

Editing and Sound Design – Matthew Hall & Mike Howorun

Post Production Producer - Rob Johnston

Written/Directed – Mike Howorun

Produced by - Matthew Hall, Brady Roberts, Mike Howorun, Dila Velázquez

Created by Mike Howorun & Brady Roberts
